ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: Thanks to Eduardo Martins (UNBC) for being a valuable source of fisheries-related inputs and Rajtantra Lilhare and Aseem Sharma (UNBC) for assisting with ArcMap applications. This research would not have been possible without data providers: Dave Patterson (DFO), Jenifer Bond (Triton Environmental Consultants), Justus Benckhuysen (Rio Tinto), and Lauren Wick and Gord Holmes (Water Survey of Canada). Thanks to Wayne Salewski for continued support of this research. We also thank Francis Zwiers (PCIC), André St-Hilaire (INRS), Bruno Larouche (Rio Tinto) and Phil Owens, Margot Parkes and Ellen Petticrew of the Integrated Watershed Research Group (IWRG) at UNBC for their input on this work. Financial support for this study was provided by the Canadian Sea Ice and Snow Evolution (CanSISE) Network (funded under the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada’s (NSERC) Climate Change and Atmospheric Research (CCAR) program) and the Nechako Environmental Enhancement Fund (NEEF). Special thanks to Marco Toffolon and Sebastiano Piccolroaz (University of Trento, Italy) for providing access to the Air2Stream model code and user guide. Thanks to the anonymous reviewers for constructive comments and suggestions that greatly improved this paper.
